name: Bellossom
flavorText: Bellossom gather at times and seem to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Bellossom is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Bellossom is now Asleep.

name: Espeon
flavorText: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy's actions.
Attack1Text: Move up to 4 damage counters from any of your Pokémon to any of your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Forretress
flavorText: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside this shell is a total mystery.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage times the number of Pineco and Forretress you have in play. This attack does 30 damage to each of your Pineco and Forretress in play.

name: Gliscor
flavorText: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey… Then its elongated fangs do the rest.
Attack1Text: If, before Gliscor does damage, the Defending Pokémon has no damage counters on it and is then damaged by this attack (after applying Weakness and Resistance), the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Houndoom
flavorText: Upon hearing its eerie howls, other Pokémon get the shivers and head straight back to their nests.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Fighting Pokémon in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: Your opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

name: Magcargo
flavorText: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Magcargo. If you do , this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy card you discarded.

name: Scizor
flavorText: Its wings are not used for flying. They are flapped at high speed to adjust its body temperature.

name: Smeargle
flavorText: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Smeargle is your Active Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Togekiss
flavorText: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
Attack1Text: Remove all damage counters from each of your Pokémon. Shuffle Togekiss and all cards attached to it back into your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Umbreon
flavorText: When agitated, this Pokémon protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Umbreon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 damage.

name: Dodrio
flavorText: It collects data and plans three times as wisely, but it may think too much and fall into a state of immobility.
Ability1Text: As long as Dodrio is on your Bench, your Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless less.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Drifblim
flavorText: It can generate and release gas within its body. That's how it can control the altitude of its drift.
Attack1Text: Drifblim does 20 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Shuffle Drifblim and all cards attached to it back into your deck. Then, your opponent shuffles the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck. (You choose your new Active Pokémon first.)

name: Forretress
flavorText: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: You may switch Forretress with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Hariyama
flavorText: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.
Attack2Text: You may do 80 damage plus 20 more damage. If you do, Hariyama does 20 damage to itself.

name: Honchkrow
flavorText: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Honchkrow
flavorText: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Darkness Pokémon in your discard pile.

name: Leafeon
flavorText: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage damage times the number of Special Conditions affecting the Defending Pokémon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Metagross
flavorText: It folds its four legs when flying. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Mismagius
flavorText: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards in your opponent's hand.]

name: Rotom
flavorText: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of your face-down Prize cards with the top card of your deck. This power can't be used if Rotom is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Skarmory
flavorText: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Tropius
flavorText: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It's a highly favored tropical snack.
Attack1Text: Remove 6 damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Vespiquen
flavorText: It raises grubs in the holes in its body. It secretes pheromones to control Combee.
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Grass Pokémon by attacks.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Vespiquen's Retreat Cost is 0.

name: Vileplume
flavorText: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
Ability1Text: Each player can't play any Trainer cards from his or her hand.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Weavile
flavorText: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you play Weavile from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. Choose a card from your opponent's hand and discard it.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

name: Flareon
flavorText: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to Flareon.

name: Gloom
flavorText: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

name: Jolteon
flavorText: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Jolteon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Lairon
flavorText: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Metal Energy card and attach it to Lairon.

name: Metang
flavorText: When two Beldum fuse together, a magnetic nervous system places their brains in union.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Muk
flavorText: Its body is made of a powerful poison. Touching it accidentally will cause a fever that requires bed rest.
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Pinsir
flavorText: With its horns, it digs burrows to sleep in at night. In the morning, damp soil clings to its body.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Raichu
flavorText: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Raticate
flavorText: Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop growing, so it gnaws to pare them down.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Discard a Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Sableye
flavorText: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for any 1 card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.
Attack2Text: If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Scyther
flavorText: When it moves, it leaves only a blur. If it hides in grass, its protective colors make it invisible.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if Scyther would be damaged by an attack, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that attack's damage done to Scyther.

name: Skuntank
flavorText: It attacks by spraying a repugnant fluid from its tail, but the stench dulls after a few squirts.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Slowbro
flavorText: Naturally dull to begin with, it lost its ability to feel pain due to Shellder's seeping poison.
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from Slowbro.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, Slowbro is now Confused.

name: Togetic
flavorText: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage done to Togetic during your opponent's next turn.

name: Unown
flavorText: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Unown from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your deck for a Darkness Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Vaporeon
flavorText: When Vaporeon's fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Vaporeon.
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Aron
flavorText: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that covered its whole body and develops a new one.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Beldum
flavorText: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Combee
flavorText: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.
Attack1Text: If Vespiquen is on your Bench and has any damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Doduo
flavorText: By alternately raising and lowering its two heads, it balances itself to be more stable while running.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Drifloon
flavorText: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Drifloon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: Its irregularly configured DNA is affected by its surroundings. It evolves if its environment changes.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Gligar
flavorText: It flies straight at its target's face then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

name: Grimer
flavorText: Wherever Grimer has passed, so many germs are left behind that no plants will ever grow again.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost is Colorless more.

name: Hitmonchan
flavorText: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attack, including damage, done to Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Hitmonlee
flavorText: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.

name: Houndour
flavorText: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.

name: Houndour
flavorText: To corner prey, they check each other's location using barks that only they can understand.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Makuhita
flavorText: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

name: Mawile
flavorText: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
Attack1Text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your hand. If not, discard it and draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Misdreavus
flavorText: It loves to bite and yank people's hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.
Attack2Text: Each player draws 3 cards.

name: Murkrow
flavorText: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Murkrow
flavorText: It is said that when chased, it lures its attacker onto dark mountain trails where the foe will get lost.

name: Oddish
flavorText: Awakened by moonlight, it roams actively at night. In the day it stays quietly underground.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: This intelligent Pokémon roasts hard berries with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Pineco
flavorText: It hangs and waits for flying insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own.

name: Pineco
flavorText: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Pineco's Surprise Attack attack's base damage is 80.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Rattata
flavorText: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.

name: Scyther
flavorText: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, Scyther can't use Slashing Strike.

name: Slowpoke
flavorText: A sweet sap leaks from its tail's tip. Although not nutritious, the tail is pleasant to chew on.
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose as many Basic Pokémon as you like and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Slugma
flavorText: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fire Energy card, attach it to Slugma. This power can't be used if Slugma is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Sneasel
flavorText: Vicious in nature, it drives Pidgey from their nests and scavenges any leftovers it can find.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each of your Pokémon in play. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Stunky
flavorText: The foul fluid from its rear is so revolting that it can make people feel queasy up to a mile and a quarter away.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Togepi
flavorText: A proverb claims that happiness will come to anyone who can make a sleeping Togepi stand up.
Attack1Text: Ask your opponent if you may draw 2 cards. If yes, draw 2 cards. If no, this attack does 20 damage to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Espeon
Ability1Text: Espeon can use the attacks of all Pokémon you have in play that evolve from Eevee as its own. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon.

name: Houndoom
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned. This power can't be used if Houndoom is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Raichu
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Lightning Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Raichu. This power can't be used if Raichu is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Discard all Energy attached to Raichu.

name: Scizor
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to Scizor by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy cards attached to them.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to Scizor.

name: Slowking
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck and your opponent chooses 1 of them. Put that card into your hand and the other card on the bottom of your deck. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Umbreon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Umbreon is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, return Umbreon and all cards attached to it to your hand. This power can't be used if Umbreon is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Pokémon in play that evolves from Eevee.

name: Kyogre & Groudon LEGEND
Attack1Text: Discard the top 5 cards from your opponent's deck. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Discard the top 5 cards from your deck. This attack does 100 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

name: Kyogre & Groudon LEGEND
Attack1Text: Discard the top 5 cards from your opponent's deck. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: Discard the top 5 cards from your deck. This attack does 100 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

name: Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND
Ability1Text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND, take 1 more Prize card.
Attack1Text: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND.

name: Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND
Ability1Text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND, take 1 more Prize card.
Attack1Text: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Rayquaza & Deoxys LEGEND.
